channel.title: [Source][VB] SimilarColors
channel.description:
[code]Function SimilarColors(Color1 As Long, Color2 As Long, Tolerance As Long) As Boolean Dim R1, R2, B1, B2, G1, G2 As Byte R1 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color1, 1, 2)) R2 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color2, 1, 2)) B1 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color1, 3, 2)) B2 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color2, 3, 2)) G1 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color1, 5, 2)) G2 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color2, 5, 2)) If (Abs(R1 - R2) <= Tolerance) And (Abs(B1 - B2) <= Tolerance) And _ (Abs(G1 - G2) <= Tolerance) Then SimilarColors = True Else SimilarColors = False End Function[/code]
(I don't take any credit for this function, it was made by Abyssal with the help of Cruel)

item.title: [Source][VB] SimilarColors
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Function SimilarColors(Color1 As Long, Color2 As Long, Tolerance As Long) As Boolean
Dim R1, R2, B1, B2, G1, G2 As Byte
    R1 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color1, 1, 2))
    R2 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color2, 1, 2))
    B1 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color1, 3, 2))
    B2 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color2, 3, 2))
    G1 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color1, 5, 2))
    G2 = Val("&H" & Mid(Color2, 5, 2))
    If (Abs(R1 - R2) <= Tolerance) And (Abs(B1 - B2) <= Tolerance) And _
    (Abs(G1 - G2) <= Tolerance) Then SimilarColors = True Else SimilarColors = False
End Function

(I don't take any credit for this function, it was made by Abyssal with the help of Cruel)
